page.text: The next few steps serve as a quick start for all new Pythoneers that want to see PyTgCalls in action as quickly as possible. Let’s go!

list.item: Install PyTgCalls with pip3 install -U py-tgcalls.
Choose your MTProto client between PyrogramMod (ex Pyrogram), Telethon or Hydrogram.
Get your own Telegram API key from my.telegram.org

Open your favorite text editor and use the following:
from pytgcalls import PyTgCalls from pytgcalls import idle from pytgcalls.types import MediaStream ... chat_id = -1001185324811 app = PyTgCalls(client) app.start() app.play( chat_id, MediaStream( 'http://docs.evostream.com/sample_content/assets/sintel1m720p.mp4', ) ) idle()
Replace client and chat_id values with your own.
Watch PyTgCalls playing the audio file.
